title: Spider Vocalizations
description: Spider Vocalizations sound package with 204 high-quality monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/spider-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dec48lt117tri2h/MSE%20-%20Spider%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The spider is a nasty, fast-moving and crawling creature that has grown to an insane size. The spider's voice is accompanied by an extraterrestrial voice with screeching, squeaking, hissing, splashing venom, somewhat resembling that of a giant worm.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 14 voice actions, including 204 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 20 voice sounds during an attack
  • 16 battle shouts
  • 20 biting voice sounds
  • 20 deaths
  • 16 growls
  • 8 hissing sounds
  • 24 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 8 victory shouts
  • 4 breathing sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 8 idle voice sounds
  • 12 sounds of jumping and action
  • 20 snorting and grunting sounds


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of nasty monsters: spider, worm, alien, venom, demon, ghost and and other creepy, crawling, hissing critters.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 204 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 14 voice actions
  • 108 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 52 voice samples of the pain type
  • 44 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 204

Number of Audio Cues: 204

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 04 minutes 36 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
